---
pagetitle: "Publications"
toc: false
listing:
  - id: articles
    contents: "articles/*.qmd"
    template: ../ejs/article.ejs
    categories: true
    sort:
      - "year desc"
      - "title"
    sort-ui: [title,author,publication,year]
    filter-ui: [title,author,publication,year]
    page-size: 10
    field-display-names: 
      publication: "Publication"
      year: "Year"
---


```{=html}
<style>
/* ===== Publication list: no bullets, no left indent ===== */
.pub-list{
  list-style: none;
  padding-left: 0;
  margin-left: 0;
}
.pub-list > li{
  list-style: none;
  margin: 0 0 1rem 0;
  padding-bottom: 1rem;
  border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.08);
}

/* ===== Title ===== */
.pub-title-link{
  text-decoration: none;
  font-weight: 550;
}
.pub-title-link:hover{
  text-decoration: underline;
  text-decoration-thickness: 1.5px;
  text-underline-offset: 4px;
}


/* ===== Meta ===== */
.pub-meta{
  margin-top: .15rem;
  color: rgba(0,0,0,0.72);
}

/* ===== Buttons ===== */
.paper-actions{
  display: inline-flex;
  gap: 8px;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  margin-top: 8px;
}

.pub-btn{
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 6px;
  padding: 6px 12px;
  border-radius: 10px;
  border: 1.8px solid currentColor;
  text-decoration: none;
  font-size: .86rem;
  font-weight: 650;
  line-height: 1;
  background: transparent;
  transition: color .15s ease, background-color .15s ease, box-shadow .15s ease;
}
.pub-btn:hover{
  box-shadow: 0 2px 6px rgba(0,0,0,.08);
}

/* Button types */
.pub-paper{ color:#1f5fbf; }
.pub-paper:hover{ color:#174a94; background:rgba(31,95,191,.08); }

.pub-code{ color:#1f8f4d; }
.pub-code:hover{ color:#166b39; background:rgba(31,143,77,.08); }

.pub-pres{ color:#d93025; }
.pub-pres:hover{ color:#a61f18; background:rgba(217,48,37,.08); }

.pub-poster{ color:#7b4fd6; }
.pub-poster:hover{ color:#5f3fb0; background:rgba(123,79,214,.08); }

.pub-details{ color:#444; }
.pub-details:hover{ color:#111; background:rgba(0,0,0,.05); }
</style>


<style>
.pub-row{
  display:flex;
  gap:14px;
  align-items:flex-start;
}

.pub-thumb{
  flex:0 0 auto;
  width:92px;
  height:92px;
  border-radius:12px;
  overflow:hidden;
  border:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,.10);
  box-shadow:0 6px 16px rgba(0,0,0,.06);
  background:#fff;
}

.pub-thumb img{
  width:100%;
  height:100%;
  object-fit:cover;
  display:block;
}
.pub-header{
  display:flex;
  justify-content:space-between;
  align-items:center;
  margin-bottom:1rem;
}

.pub-title{
  margin:0;
  font-size:1.6rem;
  font-weight:700;
  color: var(--quarto-hl-color, #8b3f1f); /* fallback */
}

.pub-total{
  padding:6px 14px;
  border-radius:999px;
  font-size:0.9rem;
  font-weight:600;
  color: var(--quarto-hl-color, #8b3f1f);
  background: rgba(139, 63, 31, 0.08);
  border:1px solid rgba(139, 63, 31, 0.35);
  white-space:nowrap;
}



.pub-main{ flex:1 1 auto; min-width:0; }

/* mobile: stack nicely */
@media (max-width: 650px){
  .pub-row{ flex-direction:column; }
  .pub-thumb{ width:110px; height:110px; }
}
</style>

<nav aria-label="breadcrumb">
  <ol class="breadcrumb">
    <li class="breadcrumb-item"><a href="/">Home</a></li>
    <li class="breadcrumb-item active" aria-current="page">Publications</li>
  </ol>
</nav>
```

<div class="pub-header">
  <h3 class="pub-title">Publications</h3>
  <span class="pub-total">
    Total:8 <strong><span data-listing-count="articles"></span></strong>
  </span>
</div>
